price: (37) It [i.e., life] is not but our worldly life - we die and live, but we will not be resurrected.
arabic: إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنۡيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحۡيَا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَبۡعُوثِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: in hiya illā ḥayātunā al-dun'yā namūtu wanaḥyā wamā naḥnu bimabʿūthīna
